oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig.WlsServerConfig

  • Packages that use WlsServerConfig 
    Package Description
    oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers
    Helper classes that provide easy access to various Kubernetes features.
    oracle.kubernetes.operator.utils  
    oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig
    Classes used to retrieve configuration of a WebLogic Domain or health from individual servers.

      Methods in oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig that return types with arguments of type WlsServerConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<WlsServerConfig> WlsDynamicServersConfig.getServerConfigs()
      Return list of WlsServerConfig objects containing configurations of WLS dynamic server that can be started under the current cluster size
      Map<String,WlsServerConfig> WlsDomainConfig.getServerConfigs()
      Returns configuration of servers found in the WLS domain, including admin server, standalone managed servers that do not belong to any cluster, and statically configured managed servers that belong to a cluster.
      List<WlsServerConfig> WlsClusterConfig.getServerConfigs()
      Returns a list of server configurations for servers that belong to this cluster, which includes both statically configured servers and dynamic servers
      List<WlsServerConfig> WlsDomainConfig.getServers()
